header.title: We Make Your Life Happier By Saving Your Time
header.paragraph: We Know The Value Of Time, Let Us Take Care Of Your Needs
header.appMessage: Try our mobile app. It's free to download.

about.title: What We Do?
about.paragraph: We create a trustworthy community where you get connected with vetted Taskers with right skill in your neighborhood to get your job done. You get help with peace of mind at your fingertips when you need it. From simple tasks like cleaning and shopping to handyman services, Apurini instantly connects you with the right Tasker.
why: A rating and review system to find the best person for the task.
Taskers are pre-screened, trustable, and sourced from the local community.
Liablity insurance provides extra security to customers.
